newsArray.title: Morne Morkel Press Conference: Virat Kohli-Rohit Sharma set for 2027 WC, Shreyas Iyer Update & More
newsArray.description: India bowling coach Morne Morkel stressed the need to quickly reset after the 0-2 Test defeat to South Africa, urging focus on white-ball cricket ahead of the ODI series. Calling the Proteas “dangerous” with momentum, he emphasised a strong start, backed the return of Rohit and Kohli, encouraged young pacers, and confirmed positive recovery updates for Gill and Iyer.
creator: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
